snippet: The smuggling of lucrative iron ore is an example of the way Mexican organized crime groups have expanded beyond drug trafficking into a diverse range of rackets.
abstract: Mexico has stepped up its effort to crack down on the Knights Templar, one of the most powerful and feared criminal organizations in the country, with a focus on gang's lucrative infiltration of mining industry along with operations smuggling iron ore to China.
lead_paragraph: The smuggling of lucrative iron ore is an example of the way Mexican organized crime groups have expanded beyond drug trafficking into a diverse range of rackets.

headline.main: Mexico Targets Gang That Infiltrated the Mining Industry
headline.print_headline: Mexico Targets Gang That Infiltrated the Mining Industry
